summary.span: 表示允许服务的客户端查找并与服务通信的服务的终结点。

span.span: Represents the endpoint for a service that allows clients of the service to find and communicate with the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该服务终结点包含客户端在此终结点进行查找和与服务交互所需的地址、绑定、协定和行为信息。The service endpoint contains the information about the address, binding, contract, and behavior required by a client to find and interact with the service at this endpoint. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ServiceEndpoint#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_serviceendpoint/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ServiceEndpoint#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_serviceendpoint/vb/program.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可从说明层次结构访问的行为类型限定在特定级别。The type of behavior that is accessible from the description hierarchy is scoped to the specific level. 从 可以访问 。From the the is accessible. 如果您要访问与终结点关联的 ，则可以通过使用 属性来获取该终结点的协定。If you want access to the associated with an endpoint, you can obtain the contact for the endpoint using the property. 然后，调用 属性可以获取与该终结点关联的 对象的 。Then call the property to obtain the of the objects associated with the endpoint. ## Examples 下面的代码演示了如何添加自定义终结点行为，以及接着如何访问该行为。The following code demonstrates how to add a custom endpoint behavior and then access that behavior. summary.span: 获取或设置服务终结点的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the service endpoint.
The name the service endpoint.

value.span: 默认值为绑定名称和协定说明名称的串联。

span.span: The default value is the concatenation of the binding name and the contract description name.
For example, +'_' + .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务可能有多个终结点，因此终结点 是通过服务的名称区分的。Services may have multiple endpoints, so the endpoint is distinct from the name of the service. 使用 属性可以访问服务名称。The service name is accessed using the property. > [!NOTE] > 从服务进行访问时，此属性由 <端点名称 = " `endpointName` " \> 配置元素填充。When accessed from the service, this property is populated by the configuration element. 在客户端上访问时，此属性为 `null`。When accessed on the client, this property is `null`. （再次在客户端上）调用属性 getter 时，将会使用基于协定和绑定的默认值填充此属性。When the property getter is called (again on the client) it populates this property with a default value based on the contract and binding. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ServiceEndpoint#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_serviceendpoint/cs/snippet.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ServiceEndpoint#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_serviceendpoint/vb/snippet.vb#5)]
